author: costin
msg: - expand was used in 2 places - moved the shared code to FileUtil
- removed unused code
- moved code specific to the sanity-test application to tests.
Same for build.xml.
- moved StopTomcat in startup pagkage. It should be replaced with a more
secure system ( independent of ajp12 ) before a release.

author: nacho
msg: Now is needed to have both a connectionName
and a connectionPassword  to use the 3 params getConnection
method
Thanks to  David Weinrich [dweinr1@home.com]
for catch this

author: costin
msg: - fixed Main - now "java -jar tomcat.jar" should work ( as a replacement
for the .sh files - on JDK1.1 we still need the scripts ).
- moved generic introspection code to IntrospectionUtils
- Expand.java is used in only one place and it's doing something trivial.
It's also duplicating code from ant - there is no need to maintain a separate
version.
- StartTomcat is no longer needed

author: glenn
msg: Fix generateSessionId() so it works with a SecurityManager

author: glenn
msg: If SecurityManager being used, wrap forward() and include() with an AccessController.doPrivileged()
